import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import'../styles/patientTemplates.css';import{FaCheckCircle,FaCircle}from'react-icons/fa';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function PatientTemplatesPage(){const navigate=useNavigate();const[templates,setTemplates]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState(null);const token=localStorage.getItem('token');useEffect(()=>{if(!token){navigate('/login');return;}fetch('/api/patient/templates',{headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json','x-auth-token':token}}).then(res=>{if(res.status===401)throw new Error('SesiÃ³n expirada');if(!res.ok)throw new Error(`Error ${res.status}`);return res.json();}).then(data=>{if(!Array.isArray(data))throw new Error('Datos invÃ¡lidos');setTemplates(data.map(t=>({...t,completed:Array(t.activities.length).fill(false)})));}).catch(err=>setError(err.message)).finally(()=>setLoading(false));},[navigate,token]);const toggleActivity=(tplId,idx)=>{setTemplates(ts=>ts.map(t=>{if(t._id!==tplId)return t;const comp=[...t.completed];comp[idx]=!comp[idx];return{...t,completed:comp};}));// TODO: PATCH /api/patient/templates/:tplId/activities/:idx
};if(loading)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"pt-container",children:"Cargando plantillas\u2026"});if(error)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"pt-container",children:["Error: ",error]});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"patient-templates-page",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"pt-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Plantillas Asignadas"}),templates.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"empty-state",children:"\uD83D\uDCC2 No tienes plantillas asignadas"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"pt-grid",children:templates.map(template=>{const doneCount=template.completed.filter(c=>c).length;const total=template.activities.length;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"pt-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"pt-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:template.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"pt-progress",children:[doneCount,"/",total," completadas"]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"pt-desc",children:template.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"pt-activities",children:template.activities.map((act,i)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"pt-activity",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"pt-checkbox",onClick:()=>toggleActivity(template._id,i),children:template.completed[i]?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaCheckCircle,{}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaCircle,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:template.completed[i]?'done':'',children:act.name})]},i))})]},template._id);})})]})});}
